Package net.xeoh.plugins.base

Contains the core plugin manager classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Option
    Used as optional arguments to classes.
    Plugin
    The base class of all plugins.
    PluginConfiguration
    Gives you access to configuration items of plugins.
    PluginInformation
    Returns various information about plugins, static as well as dynamic.
    PluginManager
    This is your entry point to and the heart of JSPF.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PluginInformation.Information
    The set of information item that can be requested.

Package net.xeoh.plugins.base Description

Contains the core plugin manager classes.
Since:
1.0
